content: 20:52 With regard to Shaka, it's probably still too early for us to talk about balances, just because Shaka, as you know as we on boarded  almost 4,000 customers that opened up accounts, as Paul mentioned earlier about 60% of those customers are new to the bank as we work with them to activate their accounts, debit card usage, direct deposit, ACI's type transactions, utilizing the accounts for mobile deposits, et cetera, we're going to start to see some of those balances increase over time.
